mapper.sql:
SELECT /* prGoodsRevInfo.displayGoodsReviewList */ PGRI.REV_NO , PGRI.REV_CONT , PGRI.REV_SCR_VAL , TO_CHAR(PGRI.REV_WRT_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REV_WRT_DTM , PGRI.GOODS_NO , PGB.GOODS_NM , PSC.MD_ID , SUB.USER_NM AS MD_NM , PGRI.LOGIN_ID , EMB.MBR_NM , PGPH.SALE_PRC FROM PR_GOODS_REV_INFO PGRI , PR_GOODS_BASE PGB -- 상품기본 테이블 , PR_STD_CTG PSC -- 표준카테고리 테이블 , ST_USER_BASE SUB -- 사용자 기본 테이블 , ET_MBR_BASE EMB -- 회원 테이블 , PR_GOODS_PRC_HIST PGPH -- 상품가격이력 테이블 WHERE PGRI.GOODS_NO = PGB.GOODS_NO -- 상품번호 AND PGRI.GOODS_NO = PGPH.GOODS_NO -- 상품번호 AND PGRI.STD_CTG_NO = PSC.STD_CTG_NO -- 표준카테고리번호 AND PSC.MD_ID = SUB.USER_ID -- 사용자 아이디 AND PGRI.MBR_NO = EMB.MBR_NO -- 회원번호 AND PGRI.DEL_YN = 'N' AND PGRI.REV_DISP_STAT_CD = '20' AND PGRI.REV_WRT_DTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PGRI.REV_WRT_DTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}||'235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PSC.MD_ID LIKE #{mdId} || '%' AND PGB.GOODS_NM LIKE #{goodsNm} || '%' AND PGRI.LOGIN_ID LIKE #{loginId} || '%' AND EMB.MBR_NM LIKE #{mbrNm} || '%'
AND PGRI.REV_SCR_VAL = #{revScrVal}::numeric
ORDER BY PGRI.GOODS_NO, PGRI.REV_NO

SELECT RI.GOODS_NO /* prGoodsRevInfo.reviewListBase */ , GB.GOODS_NM , RI.REV_SCR_VAL , RI.REV_NO , RI.REV_CONT , RI.REV_GB_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR021',RI.REV_GB_CD ) AS REV_GB_CD_NM , RI.REV_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR036',RI.REV_TYP_CD ) AS REV_TYP_CD_NM , RI.LOGIN_ID , TO_CHAR(RI.REV_WRT_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REV_WRT_DTM , RI.ORD_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PR_GOODS_REV_REPLY_INFO WHERE REV_NO = RI.REV_NO) AS REPLY_CNT , RI.HLPFUL_CNT , RI.REV_DISP_STAT_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR022',RI.REV_DISP_STAT_CD ) AS REV_DISP_STAT_CD_NM , EB.ENTR_NM , RI.DISP_PROCMN_ID , TO_CHAR(RI.DISP_PROC_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_PROC_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_REV_INFO RI , PR_GOODS_BASE GB , ET_ENTR_BASE EB , ET_MBR_BASE MB WHERE 1 = 1 AND RI.GOODS_NO = GB.GOODS_NO AND GB.ENTR_NO = EB.ENTR_NO AND RI.MBR_NO = MB.MBR_NO AND RI.DEL_YN = 'N' AND RI.REV_WRT_DTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP( #{revWrtStartDtm} || ' 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RI.REV_WRT_DTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP( #{revWrtEndDtm} || ' 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RI.REV_GB_CD LIKE #{revGbCd} || '%' AND RI.REV_DISP_STAT_CD LIKE #{revDispStatCd} || '%' AND RI.GOODS_NO LIKE #{goodsNo} || '%' AND GB.GOODS_NM LIKE #{goodsNm} || '%' AND RI.LOGIN_ID LIKE #{loginId} || '%' AND MB.MBR_NM LIKE #{mbrNm} || '%'
AND EXISTS ( SELECT '1' FROM PR_GOODS_REV_REPLY_INFO RRI WHERE RI.REV_NO = RRI.REV_NO AND WRTMN_GB_CD = '20' AND WRTMN_ID = #{sysRegId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT '1' FROM PR_GOODS_REV_REPLY_INFO RRI WHERE RI.REV_NO = RRI.REV_NO AND WRTMN_GB_CD = '20' AND WRTMN_ID = #{sysRegId} )
ORDER BY REV_WRT_DTM DESC
mapper.select: SELECT RI.GOODS_NO /* prGoodsRevInfo.getReviewInfo */ , GB.GOODS_NM , RI.LOGIN_ID , SUBSTRING(RI.ORD_NO,1,8) || '-' || SUBSTRING(RI.ORD_NO,9,6) AS ORD_NO , RI.REV_NO , TO_CHAR(RI.REV_WRT_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REV_WRT_DTM , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR036',RI.REV_TYP_CD ) AS REV_TYP_CD_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR021',RI.REV_GB_CD ) AS REV_GB_CD_NM , RI.HLPFUL_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PR_GOODS_REV_REPLY_INFO WHERE REV_NO = RI.REV_NO) AS REPLY_CNT , RI.REV_SCR_VAL , RI.STFD_1_YN , RI.STFD_2_YN , RI.STFD_3_YN , RI.REV_DISP_STAT_CD , RI.DISP_PROCMN_ID , TO_CHAR(RI.DISP_PROC_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DISP_PROC_DTM , RI.PHOTO_DISP_STAT_CD , RI.REV_CONT FROM PR_GOODS_REV_INFO RI , PR_GOODS_BASE GB WHERE 1 = 1 AND RI.GOODS_NO = GB.GOODS_NO AND RI.REV_NO = #{revNo}
